Learn why running a Facebook ad campaign is always a good idea.
The luxury of traveling with yacht charter companies.

75 leads (Rs.266.67 effective lead cost) from the campaigns run by us. Lead ads are the best way to run lead generation campaigns on Facebook. Lead ads let people show their interest in a product or service by filling out a form in the ad with their details and allowing a business to follow up with them. Facebook lead ad is the expression of interest of user where they give consent to the advertiser to contact them for the particular product and service, it should not be taken as the sale of product or service, ultimate responsibility of selling and pitching the product & service is with Advertiser only.
An eMandate allows you to schedule automatic payments for all your feature renewals directly from your bank account.
Please not that It may take 2-5 business days for your bank to activate the mandate and you may be charged a one-time setup fee (upto ₹5).
A copy of the GST Invoice was also sent on your registered email address (brajmadhav@gmail.com) and mobile (+91 8243558406).
